A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The first time I watched this movie at midnight I thought it was okay\, but not a lot made sense. The humour was too forced and in your face\, floating Leia. I rewatched it a couple of days later\, more awake\, and relaxed\, and wow\, it was like a whole new movie. It makes sense (apart from Mary Poppins) it was well filmed and the story is fresh despite what the haters say. Love it\, and I will be watching it again and again
